About ISH Hospitality education. Reimagined.

What makes ISH different?

At the Indian School of Hospitality, we understand the nuances of the hospitality, travel and tourism industry- as well as the needs of the millennial student. These fields are becoming the fastest growing worldwide, and require talent that’s more versatile and flexible than ever before. Our aim is to provide you with the relevant skills, mindset and spirit to succeed as the leaders, entrepreneurs and innovators of tomorrow.

The face of the industry is changing- and we think it’s time for education to catch up, too. We’re revolutionizing hospitality education and fostering the leaders, innovators and influencers of tomorrow. Are you ready to see hospitality education, reimagined?

Why study at ISH?

The essence of hospitality isn’t something that can be distilled to fit within the pages of a textbook- it’s an entire world that is waiting to be explored and experienced. Our curriculum, a collaboration with the top ranked hotel management school worldwide, École hôtelière de Lausanne, is tailor-made to help you discover both the art and science of hospitality, and equip you with a skillset that embraces the excitement and challenges of change.

An Education with your future in mind

We’re offering a hospitality education unlike any other- from our philosophy to curriculum, ISH is bringing hospitality education up to date with the industries of today. Here’s an overview of how our unique features are setting you up for success:An academic partnership with the world’s best hospitality school- Ecole hoteliere du LausanneA matching curriculum to that offered by Ecole hoteliere du LausanneLocated near the heart of GurgaonA state of the art campusAdjoined to premier Red Fox and Lemontree hotelsBespoke, tailor made facilities for a cutting edge experience.
